Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1212.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiHuaping.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryZhengyanNew01.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryZhengyanNew01.prefab'}
{1: 'Gestrig Academy'}

{3: 'Your vision blurs as illusory images overlap. Having just ended the Deep M.I.N.D. connection with Jetavie, you need a moment to process the discomfort caused by the slight misalignment between your body and your consciousness.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiHuaping.prefab'}
{3: 'You shake your head to clear the afterimages lingering on your retinas, barely managing to steady yourself.'}

{1: '1', 3: 'Jetavie slumps nearby, breathing heavily. Her overextended assault has obliterated most of the Corrupted inside the academy, but an endless stream of them continues to appear beyond the walls.'}
{3: 'You survey the surroundings, but the clown-like figure is nowhere to be seen.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1212.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1.5'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1212.jpg'}
{3: 'While looking around, you catch sight of a Corrupted from the corner of your eye, using the corpses of its companions as stepping stones to climb over the high wall.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'Before you can react, a low shriek pierces the air near your ear. The bullet flies swift and true, shattering the Corrupted as the shot rings out.'}
{3: 'A dark line emerges from the tide of Corrupted, just as a communication signal chimes in your ear.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1212.jpg', 2: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Squad G227 has reached the designated coordinates, 【kuroname】. What's the situation on the ground?", 4: '11'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunNew.prefab'}
{3: 'You look up as the dark line comes into focus, materializing as small groups of human figures. They move with practiced coordination, tearing open a gap in the clustered mass of Corrupted.'}
{3: 'Soon, these Task Force reinforcements break through into the academy.'}
{2: "You're a huge help. The support couldn't be more timely.", 3: '51'}
{1: '1', 3: 'As the two of you speak, a field medic approaches. They inject a serum that immediately brings your exhausted mind back into focus.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1212.jpg', 2: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "I've transferred squad command authority to your terminal, Commandant. Secure the area.", 4: '11'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "A large number of Corrupted are flooding the perimeter. I'm currently leading the soldiers in the conservation area to clear them out, and I'll join you as soon as possible.", 4: '11'}
{2: 'Have you made any discoveries during your support operation?', 3: '65'}
{2: "The number of Corrupted is highly abnormal, and there's a suspected boss-level entity among them.", 3: '66'}
{3: "You keenly sense Lee's reluctance in his pauses and careful choice of words."}
{2: 'I can ask the squad leader directly, Lee.', 3: '70'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: '...G227 discovered an area that could be the source of the Corrupted while approaching your position.', 4: '11'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'And a high-energy signature escaping from the direction of the academy.', 4: '11'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'However, I recommend postponing any action against these two targets until I arrive.', 4: '11'}
{2: 'I understand your concern, Lee, but time is of the essence.', 3: '75'}
{2: 'There are many wounded who need treatment in the academy, and numerous civilians who need evacuation.', 3: '76'}
{2: "If we don't deal with the source quickly, I'm afraid the Corrupted will regroup and surround us again.", 3: '77'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "...G227 doesn't have the capability to assault an area with such high Corrupted density. Dealing with both the source and that high-energy entity requires elite Constructs.", 4: '11'}
{2: "Jetavie, how's your condition?", 3: '79'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Jetavie lifts her hair to insert the power component provided by the Task Force into the back of her neck. Upon hearing the question, she raises her gun in a gesture of readiness.'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: "No problem at all! As long as I have enough energy, I'm good to go!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'No problem. We must capture "Gwynplaine" as soon as possible.', 3: '84', 4: "We don't have enough time.", 5: '84'}
{3: 'A powerful infected mechanoid like "Gwynplaine" would wreak havoc on nearby conservation areas if it breaks free from control.'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Go find the squad leader. He'll sync the map data with you.", 4: '11'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "If there's danger, don't be reckless. I'll leave now to rendezvous with you.", 4: '11'}
{2: "I know what I'm doing, don't worry.", 3: '91'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunNew.prefab'}
{3: "After ending the call, your gaze lands on Jetavie. She's still a bit unsteady on her feet, but has clearly regained some of her energy."}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'Finally... we meet again, Chosen One!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'What kind of life have you been living in this world? Meeting me again is such a miracle...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'I have so, so many things I want to tell you, and so, so many things I want to do with you.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'But, before that...', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Her smile slowly fades, replaced by an icy gaze fixed in the direction where the clown escaped.'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'Jetavie will eliminate every obstacle that dares to stand in our way, one by one.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: "I won't let anyone take you away from me ever again.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'I feel the same way, Jetavie.', 3: '108', 4: 'Yes.', 5: '108'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: "Now then, Chosen One, let's embark on a journey with me.", 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1229.jpg'}
{3: 'Following the trail Lee provided, Jetavie and you drive to a factory billowing with thick smoke.'}
{3: 'Seemingly quite displeased with the excessive decor of this place, Jetavie pinches her nose and furrows her brow.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'Hah... so this really is the source of the Corrupted...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: "Let's make this quick. I don't want to waste time I could be spending with you.", 4: '1'}
